short_summary: To request to be placed on the open construction source list for CDSB Gagetown, Prince Edward Island.
description: To request to be placed on the open construction source list for CDSB Gagetown and P.E.I project. This source list will be used by DCC to invite contractors and suppliers to bid on construction projects with an estimated value of $10 million or less. The project is located at CDSB Gagetown and P.E.I. Interested contractors and suppliers may request to be placed on the source list at anytime. However, DCC is requesting that interested contractors and suppliers submit a request to be placed on the source list as soon as possible preferably by January 15, 2023. The list will be used for procurements covered by trade agreements to which Canada is a party. By submitting a response to thisthis invitation, contractors and suppliers are providing their consent, pursuant to section 30 of the Defence Production Act, for DCC to publicly disclose, after closing, their legal name, address and whether they have been included on the OCSL.

full_summary:
#### Open Construction Source List (OCSL) Solicitation

**Title:** Invitation to submit for placement on the Open Construction Source List (OCSL)

**Reference Number:** MX-22631056458

**Amendment Number:** 2

**Solicitation Number:** AR22SLGA

**Publication Date:** December 05, 2022

**Closing Date:** March 31, 2026, 15:00:00 (ET)

**Notice URL:** <https://www.merx.com/public/solicitations/2356790583/abstract?language=EN>

**Notice URL FR:**  <https://www.merx.com/public/solicitations/2356790583/abstract?language=FR>

**Procurement Category:** Construction

**Trade Agreements:**

* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

**Language:** English

**Goods and Services:**

* Commercial construction services
* Residential construction services
* Industrial construction services
* Institutional construction services
* Civil construction services

**Description:** Defence Construction Canada (DCC) is inviting contractors and suppliers to apply to be placed on the Open Construction Source List (OCSL). The OCSL is used for commercial, residential, industrial, institutional, and civil work required by the Department of National Defence at CDSB Gagetown and satellite sites in New Brunswick, and at sites in Prince Edward Island.

All interested contractors and suppliers can submit an application at any time, but DCC requests that applications be sent by January 15, 2023, to ensure timely processing. Please note that DCC may verify which contractors have submitted bids and remove those who are no longer interested in the OCSL.

A list of divested contracts will be maintained separately.

**Contact Information:** For more information contact Justin Bennett, Defence Construction Canada, at Justin.Bennett@dcc-cdc.gc.ca or through the MERX portal at http://www.merx.com. Please note that interested firms must have an active MERX account to participate.

This solicitation outlines the terms and conditions for inclusion on the Open Construction Source List, as well as the process for tendering and contract award. By applying to the OCSL, contractors and suppliers will be given the opportunity to bid on construction services across various sites, and are expected to meet all necessary qualifications and standards.
